{{Wired embedded system |brand=HP |model=Media Vault |revision=MV2120 |price=299.99 |est_release_date=March 2008 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=Discontinued |type=NAS |pwr_v=18.5 |pwr_amp=3.5 |pwr_conn=barrel plug |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F5182 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=512 KiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV400CTTC-70G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5PS121621CFP-Y5 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated |serial=yes,, 10-pin header,, (115200,8,N,1),, CN4 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=MV88E1118;MV88E1118-NNC1; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=CMOS Real Time Clock;NXP;PCF8563;;1;,,, Dual Step-Down Switch-Mode Power Supply Controller;Maxim;MAX8744E;;1;,,, 4A, 26V, 380kHz Asynchronous Step-Down Converter;ANPEC;APW7080;;2;,,, 1A Low Dropout Positive Voltage Regulator;ANPEC;APL1117;;2;,,, 1MHz, 3A Peak Current-Limit Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;MVPG31;;2;,,, 1MHz, 7.5A Peak Current-Limit Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PG877;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4468;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel Enhancement Mode FET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4422;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel Enhancement Mode FET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4433;;1;,,, Hex Buffer and Driver With Open-Drain Outputs;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC07A;;1;,,, Dual Positive-Edge-Triggered D-Type Flip-Flop;Texas Instruments;SN74AHC74;;1;,,, 12-Bit to 24-Bit Multiplexed D-Type Latch w/ 3-State Outputs;Texas Instruments;SN74ALVCH162260;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 2.3.11;HP 1_3_1 |stock_os=Linux;2.6.12.6-arm1;LSP Version 2.2.2_HP_1_1 |tp_firmware=Debian |oui_eth=00:0A:E4 }} {{TagLine|HP MV2120 Media Vault}} :[https://support.hp.com/us-en/product/HP-Media-Vault-series/3193056/model/3660803 Support]
"P-D2 M/B", "06292-1" and "48.61N01.011" :are silkscreened on the board.
*[http://k0lee.com/hpmediavault/index.php FAQ and Knowledge Base] *[https://www.cyrius.com/debian/orion/hp/mv2120/ Installing Debian]
===Reviews=== *[https://gizmodo.com/373711/hp-media-vault-mv2120-linux-server-reviewed-one-kick-ass-little-penguin On '''GIZMODO'''] (dated Mar. 2008) *[https://www.computershopper.com/storage/reviews/hp-media-vault-mv2120 On '''Computer Shopper'''] (dated Apr. 2008)
